Field.Description: End address of the last DTQ
Field.Name: LAST_DTQ_END_ADDRESS

Field.Description: is DTQ towards local core or towards fabric
Field.Name: IS_LOCAL

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_TO_DQCQ_FC_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Select PDQs to DQCQ flow control thresholds index mapping

Field.Description: Select threshold index for SRAM-Only FC threshold
Field.Name: PDQ_SRAM_FC_TH_SELECT

Field.Description: Select threshold index for MIX-S FC threshold
Field.Name: PDQ_MIXS_FC_TH_SELECT

Field.Description: Select threshold index for MIX-D FC threshold
Field.Name: PDQ_MIXD_FC_TH_SELECT

Field.Description: Select threshold index for MIX(SRAM+DRAM) to MIX-S FC threshold
Field.Name: PDQ_MIX_MIXS_FC_TH_SELECT

Field.Description: Select threshold index for MIX(SRAM+DRAM) to MIX-D FC threshold
Field.Name: PDQ_MIX_MIXD_FC_TH_SELECT

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_TO_DQCQ_FC_TH
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PDQs to DQCQ flow control thresholds

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_SRAM_TO_DRAM_FC_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure SRAM to DRAM PDQs flow control

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_TO_DQCQ_SRAM_TO_DRAM_FC_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Select SRAM to DRAM PDQs to DQCQs flow control thresholds index mapping

Field.Description: Select threshold index for SRAM to DRAM FC
Field.Name: PDQ_SRAM_TO_DRAM_FC_TH_SELECT

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_TO_DQCQ_SRAM_TO_DRAM_FC_TH
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure SRAM to DRAM PDQs to DQCQs flow control thresholds

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_EIR_FC_LEAKY_BUCKET_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PDQs EIR leaky bucket flow control

Field.Description: Almost full threshold of the FIFO
Field.Name: ALMOST_FULL_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Almost empty threshold of the FIFO
Field.Name: ALMOST_EMPTY_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Bucket threshold to generate flow control
Field.Name: BUCKET_FC_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: How often the bucket value will be updated (period+1 clocks)
Field.Name: PERIOD

Field.Description: Number of tokens to add/subtract to bucket (in 2's complement)
Field.Name: TOKENS_DELTA0

Field.Description: Number of tokens to add/subtract to bucket (in 2's complement)
Field.Name: TOKENS_DELTA1

Field.Description: Number of tokens to add/subtract to bucket (in 2's complement)
Field.Name: TOKENS_DELTA2

Field.Description: Number of tokens to add/subtract to bucket (in 2's complement)
Field.Name: TOKENS_DELTA3

Field.Description: Almost full threshold of the FIFO
Field.Name: ALMOST_FULL_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Almost empty threshold of the FIFO
Field.Name: ALMOST_EMPTY_THRESHOLD

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_EIR_FC_LEAKY_BUCKET_DELTA_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Select deltas in FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_EIR_FC_LEAKY_BUCKET_CONFIG according to FIFO state

Field.Description: FIFO is between almost full and almost empty
Field.Name: FIFO_IN_BETWEEN

Field.Description: FIFO is not stable - almost full and almost empty
Field.Name: FIFO_NOT_STABLE

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_PDQ_DTQ_FC_ENABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Select which DTQ-FC will cause stop read from PDQ

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_RDF_DTQ_FC_ENABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Select which DTQ-FC will cause stop read from Read FIFO

Field.Description: Maximum burst size the shaper can accumulate
Field.Name: MAX_BURST

Field.Description: Is shaper will calculate rate in segments of 256B
Field.Name: SHAPER_IS_SEGMENTED

Field.Description: Enable shaper to bundle packets together
Field.Name: SHAPER_BUNDLE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable PDQ's global shaper flow control
Field.Name: ENABLE

Field.Description: enables minimal shaper rate equivalent to 1 link when reported number of links is 0
Field.Name: ZERO_ACTIVE_LINKS_RATE_ENABLE

Field.Description: is global shapers react to number of links, or rate is fixed
Field.Name: GLOBAL_SHAPERS_NOF_ACTIVE_LINKS_ENABLE

Field.Description: In mesh mode, core MC shaper react to number of links, else rate is fix
Field.Name: MESH_ACTIVE_LINKS_MC_SHPER_ENABLE

Field.Description: In mesh mode, core MC shaper is according to maximum number of links of DEV1 and DE2, else it is according to the mimimum
Field.Name: MESH_FMC_NUM_LINKS_MAX_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FABRIC_TRANSMIT_RRF_TO_PDQ_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure Read Request FIFOs to PDQs FC thresholds

Field.Description: Select which GCI indications to count
Field.Name: COUNT_SELECT
